def_cn: 天蝎宫，天蝎座(黄道十二宫之一。出生于10月23日至11月21日之间的人属此星座)
def_en: Scorpio is one of the twelve signs of the zodiac. Its symbol is a scorpion. People who are born approximately between the 23rd of October and the 21st of November come under this sign.

def_cn: 出生于天蝎宫时段的人
def_en: A Scorpio is a person whose sign of the zodiac is Scorpio.
